metadata.title: CVE-2015-6611 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48X and 6.0 before 2015-11-01 allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information, and consequently bypassan unspecified protection mechanism, via unknown vectors, aka internal bugs23905951, 23912202, 23953967, 23696300, 23600291, 23756261, 23541506,23284974, 23542351, and 23542352, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-8074.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
